channel.title: IVE TRIED EVERYTHING! i cannot get my run.bat or compile to work!
channel.description: ive configured jave and all that bull. ive dled all the new java things. ive changed the compiler to my java version. nothing will work ive restarted my computer everything i can think of. :[ please someone help me with this gay thing. when i open my runner or compiler the runner just closes instantly and the compiler says it cant find my java

item.title: IVE TRIED EVERYTHING! i cannot get my run.bat or compile to work!
item.dc:creator: @Jddogg9 Jddogg9
item.description:
@Jddogg9 wrote:

i r shit boos [br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 25, 2009, 09:04:04 pm[/size][hr]i’m sorry, i didn’t read it correctly, next time i’ll do it right. LMAO

Read full topic

item.title: IVE TRIED EVERYTHING! i cannot get my run.bat or compile to work!
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“Jddogg9, post:7, topic:290961”]omg…

go to…

my computer…

local disk

programed files

java

and THERE IS YOUR JDK@!@!!

now copy your jdk version (the last two numbers)

and put them where the current version is in your compiler.[/quote]

ARE YOU SHORTBUS???

He’s using the CLASSPATH in order to just use “java” and “javac” instead of the fully annotated class path. It means he hasn’t set his variables correctly.

Read full topic
